title: The Adventures of Stealy
description: Follow Stealy on his adventures through various places. He’s gonna just steal a couple of things.
quote: We got a plumbus. That’s six and a half brapples.
altHero: Stealy, a long-armed man wearing a vest with many pockets, stands in front of an office cubicle
alt1: Stealy putting objects in his pockets
alt2: Stealy stealing office supplies from an office as his boss yells at him
alt3: Stealy walking down the sidewalk with his boss slung over his shoulder, unconscious
alt4: Stealy at a display counter with shelves of goodies behind him
